channel.title: Dividing skills by two
channel.description: I am having trouble injecting a new concept into my server. I want to make it so that when you die, all your combat skills (Attack, HP, Range, Mage, Strength, Defence and Prayer) all get divided by two. So, if you had an attack level of 30 before you die, it would be 15 after your death. Is there any way to do this?

item.title: Dividing skills by two
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote="_Vengeance, post:4, topic:271635"]When you die, your stats are generally returned to the maximum, correct?
Instead of returning them to maximum on death, return them to half.

(u lose xp in maplestory on death dont u?)

That’s not maplestory’s idea.[/quote]
So would it be in my applyDead method?

Read full topic

When you die, your stats are generally returned to the maximum, correct?

item.title: Dividing skills by two
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“silabgarza, post:2, topic:271635”]no lol, wuld take a shitload of code, cuz the server gets lvls by ur xp
maybe cut ur xp in half wuld be more simple but still hard
since u wuld have to mess with the addSkillXP method so it divides xp

maybe copy n paste it, mess around with it? lol dont bother doing it, besides, stealing maplestorys id? (u lose xp in maplestory on death dont u?)[/quote]
Never played maplestory, so i didn’t know that.
And yeah, dividing xp by half would be better, cuz if ur att level 51 it would be a bit hard on just levels.

Read full topic

item.title: Dividing skills by two

item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

I am having trouble injecting a new concept into my server.
I want to make it so that when you die, all your combat skills (Attack, HP, Range, Mage, Strength, Defence and Prayer) all get divided by two.
So, if you had an attack level of 30 before you die, it would be 15 after your death.
Is there any way to do this?
